general_advisory: Dry weather conditions with some chances of rain. Important to monitor crop health and pest infestation.

advisory: Dry weather may favor Pyrilla and Mealy Bug infestation. Use Imidacloprid or Thiamethoxam or Profenophos for control.
Harvest when cob-sheath turns brownish and grains are hard with less than 30% moisture.
To control Hawk moth or Dead head moth, manually collect caterpillars and spray Profenophos.
Optimum weather for Chilli nursery preparation. Use recommended seed varieties.
Deficit rainfall may cause Epilachna beetle infestation. Use neem-based or chemical pesticides for management.
Prevent Damping off disease in nursery by treating seeds with Carbendazim.
Drench bed soil with Carbendazim mixed in water after sowing.
Dry weather may increase Mealy bug infestation. Use neem-based or chemical pesticides for management.
